sentence:
• salesforce.com, inc. (NYSE: CRM ) posted a fourth quarter loss per share of $0.01, narrower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of a loss of $0.03
• Pepco Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: POM ) reported fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.19, missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.20
• Dresser-Rand Group Inc. (NYSE: DRC ) posted fourth quarter earnings per share of $1.05, lower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.10
• Magna International Inc. (NYSE: MGA ) reported fourth quarter earnings per share of $1.56, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.14
